text: Horseland is a Canadianâ€“American animated television series. It was made by DIC Entertainment and Cookie Jar Group. The program is a comic mischief program that shows the events in the lives of a group of children riding at Horseland, Horseland is an equestrian school and stables. The adventures include riding the horses and entering in competitions to test their skill. The series had two different stories in each episode. It was cancelled after three season. A total of thirty-nine episodes were made. The series was first broadcast on September 16, 2006 on Discovery Channel's Discovery Kids block in the United States. title: Horseland (TV series)
